item.title: SP T. Srinivas Rao Inaugurates State-of-the-Art Volleyball Court for Police Personnel in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District SP Sri T. Srinivas Rao, IPS, emphasized that while police officials and staff must perform their duties with responsibility and dedication, maintaining physical fitness and health is equally important. He stated that sports like volleyball play a significant role in keeping the staff physically strong and healthy.
Today, the SP, along with Armed Reserve DSP Narendra Rao, inaugurated a state-of-the-art volleyball court for the police officials and staff within the premises of th...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Gadwal MLA Advocates for Industrial Development to Boost Employment Opportunities
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy met the Minister for Industries, Commerce, Information Technology, Electronics, and Communication, Duddilla Sridhar Babu, at the Minister's camp office in Hyderabad. During the meeting, the MLA requested the Minister to consider establishing industries in the Gadwal constituency.
The MLA highlighted Gadwal's strategic location as a tri-state junction and emphasized the region's favorable conditions for industrial growth. He pointed out the abundance...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Collectors inspect food quality at Telangana residential schools
item.description:
<![CDATA[Senior officers from various district administrations on Wednesday (December 11) inspected various government educational institutions and checked their kitchens, storerooms and the quality of food served to students.
The inspections comes in the wake of a series of food-poisoning cases in the past month. The government had constituted a task force to ensure food safety and develop an institutional mechanism for State-run educational institutions. It was also decided to constitute institution-l...]]>
item.author: Authors
